name: Light please
description:
LIGHT PLEASE

You are repairing your computer, but you need some source of light, but you don't have any phone or somethink like this, it can't be soo easy. But it is easy you only need to connect your LED to light it up. A game by two guys

It is free, soo please try it and give us some feedback. If you are interested in our work please give us some donate, it will help us a lot in next games

We will be happy if you give us some feedback, it will really help us in our next projects
